SEARCH
Package model

Class OrderLine

java.lang.Object
model.OrderLine
public class OrderLine extends Object
Represents a line item in an order, including the product and its quantity. This class calculates the total price for the product line based on the quantity ordered.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderLine

      public OrderLine(int id, int amount, Product product)
      Constructs an OrderLine with the specified identifier, quantity, and product.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this order line, typically auto-generated
      amount - the quantity of the product included in this order line
      product - the product associated with this order line

    • OrderLine

      public OrderLine(int id, int amount)
      Constructs an OrderLine with the specified identifier and quantity. This constructor is typically used when the product is set later.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this order line
      amount - the quantity of the product in this order line

    • OrderLine

      public OrderLine(int amount, Product product)
      Constructs an OrderLine with the specified quantity and product. This constructor is useful when the product is available but not its identifier.
      Parameters:
      amount - the quantity of the product in this order line
      product - the product associated with this order line

  • Method Details

    • calculateLinePrice

      public float calculateLinePrice()
      Calculates the total price for this order line. The total price is computed by multiplying the product's price by the quantity.
      Returns:
      the total price for this order line, calculated as product price * quantity

    • getAmount

      public int getAmount()
      Gets the quantity of the product in this order line.
      Returns:
      the quantity of the product

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(int amount)
      Sets the quantity of the product in this order line.
      Parameters:
      amount - the new quantity of the product

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique identifier for this order line.
      Returns:
      the unique identifier

    • setId

      public void setId(int id)
      Sets the unique identifier for this order line.
      Parameters:
      id - the new unique identifier

    • getProducto

      public Product getProducto()
      Gets the product associated with this order line.
      Returns:
      the product for this order line

    • setProducto

      public void setProducto(Product product)
      Sets the product for this order line.
      Parameters:
      product - the new product to associate with this order line

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this order line to another object for equality. Two OrderLine objects are considered equal if they have the same quantity and the same product, as well as the same line price.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if this order line is equal to the specified object; false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for this order line. The hash code is calculated based on the amount and the product.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      a hash code value for this order line

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this order line, including the unique identifier, quantity, product details, and calculated line price.
      Overrides:
